SageTVPlugin.Name: Complementary Metadata Tools (CMT)
SageTVPlugin.Description: Provides the ability to edit metadata within SageTV and fetch and manage metadata and fanart. Displays and saves information from the Internet Movie Data Base. Provides access to BMT configuration, scanning and lookups from within SageTV. Can create .my and .properties files for recordings, cleanup orphan .my and .properties files and import information from .my files into the SageTV wiz.bin. Provides the ability to display information from .my files in Recording and Video Detail panels. ***** THIS PLUGIN REPLACES "Read, Write and Edit Metadata" and "IMDB Search" plugins in SageTV 7.1
SageTVPlugin.Author: JREkiwi
